swp_details.scheme_name: SHRIRAM BALANCED ADVANTAGE FUND DIRECT - GROWTH

meta_title: Shriram Balanced Advantage Fund Direct   Growth - Groww
meta_desc: Shriram Balanced Advantage Fund Direct   Growth is Dynamic Asset Allocation Hybrid mutual fund with risk-reward rating of 3/10. It has track record of 5 years, with three year return of 13.31. Risk is Moderately High
scheme_name: Shriram Balanced Advantage Fund Direct   Growth
exit_load: Exit Load for units in excess of 12% of the investment,1% will be charged for redemption within 90 days.
description: The scheme seeks to generate capital appreciation with relatively lower volatility over a longer tenure of time. The Scheme will accordingly invest in equities, arbitrage opportunities, derivative strategies and debt and money market instruments.

analysis.analysis_desc:
Average credit rating of the fund's holdings: AAA 
This fund has holdings of the highest quality
Consistently higher annualised returns than category average for the past 1Y, 3Y and 5Y

Higher alpha: 2.93 
The fund has generated returns higher than benchmark - NIFTY 50 Hybrid Composite debt 50:50 Index - in the last 3Y

amc_info.name: Shriram Mutual Fund
amc_info.address: 511-512, Meadows, Sahar Plaza,J. B. Nagar, Andheri (East), Mumbai 400059
amc_info.description: Shriram Mutual Fund started their mutual fund on 05/12/1994 and its managing total assets of Rs.43 Cr. Its ranked at 40 as per total assets at end of 30th Sep 2016.

category_info.category_helper_text: Invests in stocks as per Contrarian investment strategy
category_info.tax_impact: If you redeem within one year, returns are taxed at 20%. If you redeem after one year, returns exceeding Rs 1.25 lakh in a financial year are taxed at 12.5%.
category_info.description: Contra funds follow Contrarian strategy which means investing in stocks in contrast to the prevailing sentiment. Minimum investment in equity is 65%.

fund_manager_details.experience: Prior to joining Shriram Asset Management Co. Ltd she has worked with Zacks Research Pvt Ltd as Research Head and Shriram Insight Share Brokers Ltd
